Sir, I have the honour to inform you that His Highness The Sultan of Muscat and Oman, has been kind enough to grant me an interview, with a view to considering my services, in a Civil Administrative capacity. I have recently been released from the Indian Array, and was introduced to His Highness, by The Military Commandant of the Muscat Infantry. titleInfo.title: Ext 440/48 'Major P. T. Fforde: possible employment under Sultan of Muscat'

physicalDescription.extent: The papers are arranged in approximate chronological order from the rear to the front of the file.

Foliation: the foliation sequence (used for referencing) commences at the front cover with 1, and terminates at the inside back cover with 11; these numbers are written in pencil, are circled, and are located in the top right corner of the recto side of each folio.

mods.abstract: The file contains correspondence regarding the potential employment of Major Patrick T Fforde, formerly of the Indian Army, by the Sultan of Muscat and Oman. As well as Fforde, the primary correspondents are: Foreign Office; Commonwealth Relations Office; Political Resident, Persian Gulf. The file includes a divider, which gives a list of correspondence references contained in the file by year. This is placed at the back of the correspondence.
